description: This file defines an Angular standalone component named CardComponent, which renders a stylized surface card with optional title, header, footer, and action sections. It includes input properties and template styling.

classes.name: CardComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for rendering a customizable card layout with optional header, footer, and actions.

methods.name: hasHeader
methods.description: Returns false, indicating no header content is configured.

methods.name: hasFooter
methods.description: Returns false, indicating no footer content is configured.
